---Rippersnapper---

Rippersnapper begins to turn towards his fighting comrades, when 
several of Cinder's lasers streak by his face and body. "Whoa!" He 
exclaims, "Somebody shoot Rippersnapper." He whips around to 
face Cinder, and starts running forward, shooting three blasts from 
his cyclone gun.
